entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 10 except 6 over eastern sections.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 10 except 6 over eastern sections. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 13 except 7 over eastern sections.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 13 except 7 over eastern sections. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
